children.text: (a) In accordance with 41 U.S.C. 4506(h), the head of an agency, other than the Department of Defense, shall prepare a report for each fiscal year in which a recommendation has been received pursuant to 32.006-4(a). Reports within the Department of Defense shall be prepared in accordance with 10 U.S.C. 2307(i)(7).
(b) In accordance with 41 U.S.C. 4506(h) and 10 U.S.C. 2307(i)(7), each report shall containâ€”
(1) Each recommendation made by the remedy coordination official;
(2) The actions taken on the recommendation(s), with reasons for such actions; and
(3) An assessment of the effects of each action on the Government.
